item.description: Yiwen (Vivian) Wu Computer Engineering | University of Waterloo | Student No.20777081 Personal Web: vivi-wu.com Email Address: y657wu@uwaterloo.ca Phone Number: 647-673-5665 SKILLS ————————————————————————————————————————————————— • Web service and data transfer: Json, XML, REST. • Database and reporting: SQL Server 2014 • Developing: C#, C++, ASP.net, ADO.NET, MVC, Entity frameworks, Razor, Webforms • Front end: HTML 5, JavaScript, jQuery libraries, jqxWidgets, Angular • System database integration: SAPB1, Acumatica, Sage 300, Oracle NetSuite WORK EXPERIENCE ————————————————————————————————————————————————— Software Developer January 2020- April 2020 Edisoft Inc.
